snippet.title: Dragonero The Rise of Draquir Announcement Trailer ENG
snippet.description:
Unveiled trailer for "Dragonero - Rise of Draquir," an old-school turn-based role-playing game that takes players into the world of comic books.
With an original and complex story told by more than two hours of animated scenes, players will step into the shoes of the five heroes Ian, Gmor, Myrva, Alben and Sera.

They will explore the vast world of Erondàr in dungeons, both procedurally generated and hand-crafted, and take advantage of classic turn-based combat to overwhelm enemies through strategy.

All enhanced by the art style typical of Dragonero comics.

Add to wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2532770/Dragonero/
